label: Hemp, Claudia & Klaus–gerhard Heller.  2017. The genus Phlesirtes Bolivar, 1922 (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae, Conocephalini; Karniellina), a review of the genus with data on its bioacoustics and the description of new species. Zootaxa 4244(4): 451–477.
